description.value:
Cost all your remaining sanguimancy Hit Points (minimum 3)

A shell made up of hundreds of razor-thin needles of blood forms around you before exploding outward, lacerating foes in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. The needles deal piercing damage equal to double the number of sanguimancy Hit Points you spent, to a maximum of 80 damage. Creatures caught in the blast must attempt a @Check[reflex|against:class-spell|basic] save. The DC for this save is your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.
